title: Fallout 4 Pre-Loading Confirmed for Xbox One, PS4, PC
text:
Fallout 4 Pre-Loading Confirmed for Xbox One, PS4, PC 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
All versions of Bethesda's upcoming post-apocalyptic role-playing game Fallout 4 will support pre-loading, the developer has confirmed. Mark...
